name: ChakraYoga
0:
”Alexa, open chakra yoga”
”Alexa, start chakra yoga”
”Alexa, ask chakra yoga to start workout”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chakra yoga
des:
Developed for those with some familiarity with yoga and poses, this skill is focused on gentle yoga poses that correspond to each of your chakras, starting at the first (Muladhara) and ending with the Lotus position for a seamless transition for your personal meditation. This set is best done in the morning after waking.
(This was created using Blueprints. This yoga routine is not intended to cure any illness or ailment. User is responsible for any injury or negative effects that occur as a result of use of this Skill. Please exercise caution when attempting any new physical activity.)
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
